#summary How to install.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

Before you can use SimpleOpenNI you have to install Processing and OpenNI.

 * [Installation#Processing Processing Installation]
 * [Installation#Windows Windows Installation]
 * [Installation#OSX OSX Installation]
 * [Installation#Linux Linux Installation]
----

= Processing =

  * Download [http://processing.org/download/ Processing >= 2.0] for your platform and install it
  * Go to the menu: Tools-> Add Tool...
  * Select and install SimpleOpenNI
----

= Windows =

* Install Kinect SDK
  * Download [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=275588 Kinect SDK] from the [http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/kinectforwindows/develop/developer-downloads.aspx Developer Page]
  * Start the Kinect SDK Installer

If everything worked out, you should see the camera in your Device Manager(under 'Kinect for Windows').

----
= OSX =

Don't need to install, should work out of the box.
----
= Linux =

  * Install OpenNI Device Rules
{{{
cd ~/Downloads
wget https://simple-openni.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/SimpleOpenNI-2.0/platform/linux/installLinuxRules.sh
wget https://simple-openni.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/SimpleOpenNI-2.0/platform/linux/primesense-usb.rules
sudo ./installLinuxRules.sh
}}}
